alert.note: Alert for Logan (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 3:11PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Logan County through 345 PM CDT... At 311 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Emden, or 11 miles northeast of Mason City, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Emden around 320 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Hartsburg. This includes Interstate 155 between mile markers 3 and 10. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
